<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get comment</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/comments/{comment_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>

<SecuritySchemes infoPath={"api/v2/ticketing/unified-ticketing-api-preview"}></SecuritySchemes>



:::note
This feature is only available in Preview to select customers on our Enterprise plan. [Contact us](mailto:team@supaglue.com) for more information.
:::

Returns a Comment object with the given id.
